name: campfire
description:
Remember those nights, sitting around the campfire.
The darkblue sky, the green matches, the colors of the campfire, the red coals, the grey ashes.
install_details: Put it in "~/.vim/colors" or in "<your vim directory>\vimfiles\colors" on Windows. Do ":colo campfire" to apply it. To install it as your default color scheme, add "colo campfire" to your vimrc file.
